EmailTemplate.subject: Survey: Gift card in return! (1493399271.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi Ruth, As VP of Mercy Health System Corporation, you likely make hundreds of decisions each week. That is why I wanted to reach out with the opportunity to make an impactful decision, and offer to partner with you to support a cause that is close to you. We recently launched our Infrastructure Optimization Survey, and are offering a $25 Amazon gift card for completing the 5 minute survey by April 1st. We are also offering $100 Amazon gift card for agreeing to a 30 minute meeting with a Turbonomic engineer (meeting must complete by May15th). If at the end of the meeting, you choose to engage in a proof of value, we will donate $1,000 to the charity of your choosing. I look forward to the opportunity to speak with you about the benefits Turbonomic can bring to your infrastructure! Would you be open to a conversation the second week of May? Best, Kathleen Norchi
